projects.title: Starman's roadtrip to mars
desc: Starman’s Roadtrip To Mars is a fully functional game written in C++ and OpenGL. The idea is dedicated to Elon Musk’s Falcon Heavy Launch which contained a tesla model s with a dummy that should reach mars.
Despite being a game, we set the focus on the game engine development itself. I implemented several effects such as particle systems, HDR, cell shading as well as native PhysX implementation.
